description: Custom ECL queries for Erythrocytes/RBC Count (LOINC 26453-1)

queries.name: Refined Query V2 (Property-Specific: Number Concentration)
queries.description: Uses Component = Erythrocyte AND Property = Number concentration (118550005) to separate RBC count from Hematocrit (which uses Volume fraction). This prevents cross-contamination between measurements that share the same Component.
